description:
Furusawa`s love interest. He has a part time job at at her family`s market.
Yuuko has a cameo in "Here is Devilwood" as the "ferryman`s wife" opposite Furusawa in OAV 3.
Mitsuru`s advice helped them get together, so he has to tease Furusawa about her in the anime. Yuuko`s birthday is Valentine`s Day.
name: Kawasumi Yuuko
